info.name: GeoCheckerMinimal
info.description:
Replace the neon green interface by a cleaner, flatter look. Main changes to the interface:
  • main screen is centered, rather than left-aligned, making it easier to use on large screens;
  • interface is white instead of green;
  • big logo replaced by a simpler text;
info.additionalInfo: 16/12/2015 : added geotjek.dk to the list of supported domains
